text: Blastochloris viridis is a bacterium from the genus of Blastochloris which was isolated from water of the Clarke reservation lake in New York in the United StatesDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen ==Further reading== * ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Blastochloris viridis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Phyllobacteriaceae Category:Bacteria described in 1997
title: Blastochloris viridis
